Articles.Content: I think that Squad should add stock 5m tanks and engines. Then you can make stock Apollo missions and others...also they should add a 3.75m fuel adapter to 5m and 2.5m.

I would prefer size between 1.25 m and 2.5 m. Between them is factor of 4 which leads to impractical solutions when 1.25 m is too small and 2.5 m unnecessarily large. I know that there is a mod, I should try it.

Apollo-style missions (I understand that means 3 kerbal crew, separate lander and rendezvous on Mun orbit) does not need even 3.75 m parts. There is no need for 5 m parts in stock game. I think that people who want to build extremities of several thousands of tons are so few that 5 m things can stay in mod. At least before memory problems have been fixed and there is practical way to handle long part lists in VAB.

Well, I guess your right....ON TO THE NEXT SUGGESTION!!

The Mark 1-2 Pod's hatch should be centered like the rest, preferably within the two side windows and under the forward-facing windows. It would still be out of sight and would make it a more faithful replica of the Apollo capsule.

In my view a limited range of 5m parts would be worth adding. In particular a 5m orange tank and matching nosecone pieces would make shuttles really look the part. But I don't think there's a need for 5m engines or most parts, just a few fuel tanks and a couple of size adapters.

2 minutes ago, cantab said:

In my view a limited range of 5m parts would be worth adding. In particular a 5m orange tank and matching nosecone pieces would make shuttles really look the part. But I don't think there's a need for 5m engines or most parts, just a few fuel tanks and a couple of size adapters.

As far as 5m parts go I think this is the best solution. Larger fuel tanks only, with a few size adapters along the same basic lines as the existing ones.

Adapters that allow engine clusters rather than 5m engines makes far more sense to me.
Well, larger engine clusterers are a good idea!

On 15/12/2015, 14:05:00, Hannu2 said:

I would prefer size between 1.25 m and 2.5 m. Between them is factor of 4 which leads to impractical solutions when 1.25 m is too small and 2.5 m unnecessarily large. I know that there is a mod, I should try it.

Do you have a link to that mod?
Unfortunately it seems that it have some problems with 1.0.5.
Tantares and Bluedog Design Bureau have 1.875m parts, and they look great. They also have 0.9375m parts which are in-between 0.625m and 1.25m parts.

On 12/15/2015, 8:23:15, TopHeavy11 said:

I think that Squad should add stock 5m tanks and engines. Then you can make stock Apollo missions and others...also they should add a 3.75m fuel adapter to 5m and 2.5m.

Good idea!
